v-avatar/text.description: String that contains the text of the avatar

v-avatar/size.description: Set the size of the avatar

v-btn/dropdown.description: Set the type of the button to a dropdown

v-btn/pilled.description: Set the button to a pilled shape

v-btn/circle.description: Set the shape of the button to a circle

v-btn/animated.description: Add a button animation whenever the user clicks on it

v-btn/outline.description: Set the type of color of the button to outline

v-btn/color.description: Set the color of the button

v-btn/size.description: Set the size of the button

v-btn-group/filled.description: Set the buttons group to fill

v-badge/content.description: Set the content of the badge, default is 0

v-badge/position.description: Set the position of the content

v-badge/color.description: Set the color of the badge

v-card/animated.description: Set if the card will get animated through e.g. an image

v-card/equalHeight.description: Set equal height of all other cards in the row

v-card-image/image.description: Set the image source. Could be a URL or you need to require the imported image

v-code/value.description: Specifies the code of the component

v-code/lang.description: Set the language of the code component (supported: bash, html, css, javascript)

v-code/dark.description: Set the code component to dark mode

v-container/noPadding.description: No padding for the container component

v-divider/content.description: Displays a text between the divider

v-dropdown/right.description: Displays the dropdown menu on the right side of the element

v-dropdown/left.description: Displays the dropdown menu on the left side of the element

v-footer/fixed.description: Set the footer position to fixed

v-footer-list-item/title.description: Set the footer list item to a non clickable title footer list item

v-checkbox/id.description: Set the id for the checkbox with its label

v-checkbox/color.description: Set the color of the checkbox with the text

v-checkbox/checked.description: Set the checked status of the checkbox

v-input-color/defaultValue.description: Set the default value for the color picker

v-date-picker/date.description: Set the default date of the date picker

v-date-picker/title.description: Set the title of the date picker form

v-date-picker/information.description: Set a small information label below the date picker

v-toggle/dataCheckIcon.description: Set the check icon for the toggle component

v-toggle/dataUncheckIcon.description: Set the uncheck icon for the toggle component

v-toggle/name.description: Set the name of the input for the toggle component

v-toggle/checked.description: Set if the toggle component is checked or not

v-toggle/color.description: Set the color of the toggle component

v-radio-btn/id.description: Set the id of the radio button for the label

v-radio-btn/name.description: Set the name of the input field for the radio button

v-radio-btn/checked.description: Set wether the radio button is checked or not

v-radio-btn/color.description: Set the color of the radio button

v-input-field/pilled.description: Set wether the input field is in a pilled shape

v-input-field/select.description: Set wether the input field is a select html tag

v-input-field/focused.description: Set wether the input field is focused by default

v-input-field/success.description: Set the color for the input field to green

v-input-field/error.description: Set the color for the input field to red

v-input-field/icon.description: Add a icon for the input field that gets created by the slot of this component

v-input-field/size.description: Set the size of the input field

v-frame/height.description: Set the height of the frame

v-row/noWrap.description: No wrap for the columns inside the row

v-row/level.description: Align items in row to the same level

v-col/o.description: Define the offset for the column

v-col/w.description: Set the width of the column in a 10-grid-system

v-col/h.description: Set the height of the column in a 10-grid-system

v-col/dynamicOffset.description: Defines the dynamic offset for the column (left, right, center)

v-col/ignoreScreen.description: Ignore the screen and let the column expand

v-headline/size.description: Set the size of the headline

v-link/underlined.description: Set the link to a underlined style

v-link/animation.description: Set the animation of the link

v-grid/gap.description: Set the gap of the grid

v-grid/cols.description: Set the columns size of the grid

v-menu-item/selected.description: Set the menu item as selected

v-menu-divider/label.description: Set the label or the title for the divider

v-modal/closeTarget.description: Set the close target for the modal whenever you exit the modal

v-modal/applyDefaultCloseIcon.description: Enable default close Icon for the modal

v-modal/animation.description: Set the animation of the modal

v-modal/size.description: Set the size of the modal

v-nav-region/position.description: Set the position of a specific navbar region

v-nav-dropdown/animated.description: Set the dropdown functionality to a animated style

v-nav-dropdown/clickable.description: Set wether the dropdown is collapsed or not by default

v-nav-dropdown/id.description: Set the id of the dropdown

v-navbar-item/active.description: Set the active state of a navbar item

v-navbar/fixed.description: Set wether the navbar should be fixed or not

v-navbar/dark.description: Set the style of the navbar to a dark one

v-navbar/clear.description: Set the style of the navbar to a clear one

v-prev-btn/prevText.description: Set the previous text of the previous button

v-next-btn/nextText.description: Set the next text of the next button

v-pagination/bordered.description: Set the style of the pagination to bordered

v-pagination-item/selected.description: Set the state of the item to selected

v-pagination-item/disabled.description: Set the disabled state of the pagination item

v-parallax-element/speed.description: Set the speed of the parallax effect for the element

v-parallax-element/margin.description: Set the margin for the parallax element

v-parallax-element/stopValue.description: Set the stop value for the parallax element

v-placeholder/title.description: Set the title of the placeholder component

v-placeholder/subtitle.description: Set the subtitle of the placeholder component

v-sidebar/hoverEffect.description: Enable the hover effect of the sidebar

v-sidebar-dropdown/id.description: Set the id of the sidebar dropdown

v-sidebar-dropdown/showArrow.description: Enable a arrow in the sidebar dropdown menu

v-sidebar-item/dropdown.description: Enable this sidebaritem as a dropdown item

v-sidebar-item/selected.description: Enable the selected state of this dropdown item

v-snackbar/value.description: Show the snackbar with a v-model integration

v-snackbar/color.description: Set the color of the snackbar

v-snackbar/position.description: Set the position of the snackbar on the screen

v-snackbar/timeout.description: Set the timeout for the snackbar when it will vanish

v-space/large.description: Enable large spacing in this component

v-space/xlarge.description: Enable extra large spacing in this component

v-tabs/size.description: Set the size of the tabs

v-tabs/position.description: Set the position of the tabs (center, right, fill)

v-tabs/mode.description: Set the mode of the tabs (depth, classic)

v-tab/selected.description: Set the selected state of the tab item

v-tag-container/rounded.description: Round all tags in this container

v-tag/closable.description: Set the tag to a closable tag

v-tag/deletable.description: Set the tag to a deletable tag

v-tag/size.description: Set the size of the tag

v-tag/color.description: Set the color of the tag

v-tile-content/title.description: Set the title of the tile content

v-tile-content/subtitle.description: Set the subtitle of the tile content

v-tile/enableBoxShadow.description: Enable a box shadow for the tile component

v-toast/title.description: Set the title of the toast component

v-toast/color.description: Set the color of the toast component

v-toast/disableCloseFunction.description: Disable the close functionality of the toast component

v-toast/closable.description: Add a small close icon for the toast component
